title: Ultraman: Chou Toushi Gekiden - Suisei Senjin Tsuifon Toujou
synopsis: From the north of the galaxy a dreadful menace, Comet Warrior God Tsuifon, is fast approaching the Earth destroying everything in its path. There awaits it Fighter Ultraman, the legendary defender of the planet, and a deadly battle is about to begin.
staff: [['Amino, Tetsuro', ['Director']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Nishimori, Akira', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Katsumata, Geki', ['Art Director']]]
